version_description:
The Hevy Apple Watch app is finally here! You can now leave your iPhone in the locker room and workout with your Apple Watch.

•  Sync your Hevy routines to your Apple Watch
•  Easily track your weight lifting sets
•  Keep track of your heart rate during your workout
•  Use helpful timers for duration exercises
•  Mark sets as Warmup, Normal, Drop sets, or Failure
•  Watch workouts automatically save when reconnecting to iPhone

Big thanks to Ryan Brink for building the Apple Watch app!

•  Watch workouts automatically save when reconnecting to iPhone

Big thanks to Ryan Brink for building the Apple Watch app!

- Now you can access your body measurements from the profile screen
- Showing the first two comments on a workout directly in the feed

All exercise graphs now also plot the results from your current workout as it's being logged, so you can see how your current workout measures up with all your metrics.
Now you can navigate straight to old workout from all exercise graphs.

New advanced profile statistics, to give you more broad insights on your training. Including a muscle split graph, so you can get a better idea of which muscles your workouts have been targeting.
